tasks.label: Build resume (PDF + hi-res PNG + preview)
tasks.command: pdflatex mr_resume.tex && pdflatex mr_resume.tex && magick -density 600 mr_resume.pdf[0] -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -colorspace sRGB -strip -filter Lanczos -unsharp 0x0.6+0.6+0.02 PNG24:mr_resume.png && magick -density 600 mr_resume.pdf[0] -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -colorspace sRGB -strip -filter Lanczos -resize 1200x PNG24:mr_resume_preview.png
